column1: S160A.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S160A.DECK.  160. SURVEY NUMBER
S160A.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S160A.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. CORPORAL OR TECH 5 4. SERGEANT OR TECH 4 5. STAFF SERGEANT OR TECH 3 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT, MASTER SERGEANT, OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q2. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL CORPS 06. ARMORED COMMAND 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q3. WHAT IS YOUR MAIN ARMY JOB AT THE PRESENT TIME? (TELL EXACTLY WHAT IT IS, AS "SQUAD LEADER IN RIFLE COMPANY", "DRIVER IN HEAVY TRUCKING COMPANY", "TANK COMMANDER (MEDIUM TANKS)", "COOK IN REGIMENTAL MESS", "CLERK IN DIVISION CP", OR WHATEVER YOUR JOB IS.)  1. LINE JOB IN INFANTRY CO. 2. NON-LINE JOB IN INFANTRY CO. 3. INFANTRY JOB - NOT IN LINE CO. 4. ARMORED COMMAND LINE JOB 5. TANK DESTROYERS JOB 6. FIELD ARTILLERY JOB 7. SOS JOB 8. UNCLASSIFIED 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q4. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEAS?  1. LESS THAN 3 MONTHS 2. 3 MONTHS TO 6 MONTHS 3. 6 MONTHS TO 1 YEAR 4. 1 YEAR TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q5A. HOW LONG HAVE YOU HAD YOUR FIELD JACKET?  01. ONE MONTH 02. TWO MONTHS 03. THREE MONTHS 04. FOUR MONTHS 05. FIVE MONTHS 06. SIX MONTHS 07. SEVEN TO EIGHT MONTHS 08. NINE TO TEN MONTHS 09. ELEVEN TO TWELVE MONTHS 10. THIRTEEN TO EIGHTEEN MONTHS 11. OVER EIGHTEEN MONTHS 00. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q5B. WHAT KIND OF CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY IT IS IN NOW?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 6. DO NOT HAVE A FIELD JACKET 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q5C. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER DO YOU EXPECT IT WILL WEAR?  01. ONE MONTH 02. TWO MONTHS 03. THREE MONTHS 04. FOUR MONTHS 05. FIVE OR SIX MONTHS 06. SEVEN OR EIGHT MONTHS 07. NINE OR TEN MONTHS 08. 11 MONTHS OR MORE 09. DON'T KNOW 10. INDEFINTE PERIOD INDICATING A "SHORT TIME" 11. INDEFINITE PERIOD INDICATING A "LONG TIME" 00. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q6A. IF YOU HAD YOUR CHOICE, WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WOULD YOU RATHER HAVE?  1. FIELD JACKET 2. "NEW" FIELD JACKET (LONG TYPE) 3. COMBAT JACKET 4. SOME OTHER KIND OF FIELD JACKET OR COAT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 6B NOT CODED.
S160A.Q7. DO YOU THINK THE PRESENT FIELD JACKET IS THE RIGHT COLOR? IF NO, WHAT COLOR WOULD YOU RECOMMEND?  1. YES 2. NO, AND NO COLOR MENTIONED 3. NO, AND SOME COLOR MENTIONED 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q8. HAVE YOU SEEN A GERMAN GARMENT USED FOR THE SAME PURPOSE AS OUR FIELD JACKET THAT YOU THINK IS BETTER THAN OURS? IF YES, DESCRIBE IT BRIEFLY.  1. NO 2. YES, AND NOTHING DESCRIBED 3. YES, AND SOMETHING DESCRIBED 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q9A1. FIELD JACKET?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED
S160A.Q9A2. COMBAT JACKET?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED
S160A.Q9A3. MACKINAW?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED
S160A.Q9A4. SWEATER?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED
S160A.Q9A5. LIGHT UNDERWEAR TOP?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED
S160A.Q9A6. HEAVY UNDERWEAR TOP?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED
S160A.Q9A7. EXTRA LINER FOR FIELD JACKET?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED
S160A.Q9A8. OVERCOAT?  1. ITEM CHECKED 2. ITEM NOT CHECKED

S160A.Q9B. WOULD YOU HAVE WORN OTHER PIECES OF CLOTHING IF YOU COULD HAVE GOTTEN THEM? IF YES, WHAT ARTICLES OF CLOTHING WERE NEEDED?  1. NO, THIS WAS ENOUGH 2. YES, NOTHING SPECIFIED 3. YES, SOMETHING SPECIFIED 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q10A. HOW LONG HAVE YOU HAD YOUR RAINCOAT?  01. ONE MONTH 02. TWO MONTHS 03. THREE MONTHS 04. FOUR MONTHS 05. FIVE MONTHS 06. SIX MONTHS 07. SEVEN TO TWELVE MONTHS 08. THIRTEEN MONTHS AND OVER 09. DON'T KNOW 10. INDEFINITE PERIOD INDICATING "SHORT TIME" 11. INDEFINITE PERIOD INDICATING "LONG TIME" 00. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q10B. WHAT KIND OF CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY IT IS IN NOW?  1. VERY GOOD 2. GOOD 3. FAIR 4. POOR 5. VERY POOR 6. DO NOT HAVE A RAINCOAT 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q10C. ABOUT HOW MUCH LONGER DO YOU EXPECT IT WILL WEAR?  01. ONE MONTH 02. TWO MONTHS 03. THREE MONTHS 04. FOUR MONTHS 05. FIVE MONTHS 06. SIX MONTHS 07. SEVEN TO TWELVE MONTHS 08. THIRTEEN MONTHS AND OVER 09. DON'T KNOW 10. INDEFINITE PERIOD INDICATING "SHORT TIME" 11. INDEFINITE PERIOD INDICATING "LONG TIME" 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11A, 11B AND 11C NOT CODED.

S160A.Q12A. HAVE YOU SEEN A GERMAN GARMENT THAT YOU THINK IS BETTER THAN OUR GI RAINCOAT? IF YES, DESCRIBE IT BRIEFLY.  1. NO 2. YES, NOTHING DESCRIBED 3. YES, SOMETHING DESCRIBED 0. NO ANSWER P. IN ANSWERING THE NEXT QUESTIONS ABOUT THE GI OVERCOAT, IF YOU DO NOT NOW HAVE AN OVERCOAT, ANSWER IN TERMS OF THE LAST ONE YOU HAD.
S160A.Q13. WHICH WOULD YOU RATHER WEAR IN VERY COLD WEATHER - AN ISSUE OVERCOAT OR A MACKINAW?  1. WOULD RATHER WEAR THE MACKINAW 2. WOULD RATHER WEAR THE OVERCOAT 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q14A. IS YOUR GI OVERCOAT WARM ENOUGH FOR VERY COLD WEATHER?  1. YES, ALMOST ALWAYS 2. YES, USUALLY 3. NO, OFTEN NOT WARM ENOUGH 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q14B. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WOULD YOU SAY BEST TELLS ABOUT THE LENGTH OF THE COAT?  1. IT IS TOO LONG 2. IT IS TOO LONG, QUALIFIED BY COMMENT 3. IT IS JUST ABOUT THE RIGHT LENGTH 4. IT IS JUST ABOUT THE RIGHT LENGTH, QUALIFIED BY COMMENT 5. IT IS TOO SHORT 6. IT IS TOO SHORT, QUALIFIED BY COMMENT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 15 NOT CODED.

S160A.Q16. WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING WOULD YOU RATHER HAVE FOR GENERAL ALL-ROUND WINTER WEAR?  1. GI OVERCOAT 2. GI OVERCOAT, QUALIFIED BY COMMENT 3. MACKINAW 4. MACKINAW, QUALIFIED BY COMMENT 5. TRENCHCOAT WITH DETACHABLE LINER 6. TRENCHCOAT WITH DETACHABLE LINER, QUALIFIED BY COMMENT 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q17A. ARE YOU NOW WEARING LONG WOOLEN UNDERWEAR?  1. WEARING BOTH TOP AND BOTTOM PARTS 2. WEARING TOP PART ONLY 3. WEARING BOTTOM PART ONLY 4. AM NOT WEARING EITHER PART 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q17B. IF YOU ARE NOT WEARING THIS UNDERWEAR, WHAT IS THE REASON?  1. BECAUSE I DON'T WANT IT 2. BECAUSE I CAN'T GET IT 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q18A. HOW MANY BLANKETS DO YOU ORDINARILY USE AT PRESENT?  1. ONE 2. TWO 3. THREE 4. FOUR 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q18B. IS THIS ENOUGH TO KEEP YOU WARM?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q19. HOW DO YOU USUALLY CARRY YOUR BLANKETS?  1. FOLDED INTO DUFFLE BAG OR SIMILAR CONTAINER 2. WRAPPED IN SHELTER HALF AND ROLLED 3. IN A PACK 4. FOLDED OVER CANTEEN BELT 5. SOME OTHER WAY, BUT NOTHING WRITTEN IN 6. SOME OTHER WAY, AND SOMETHING WRITTEN IN 7. CHECKED 2 AND 3 8. CHECKED 1 AND 3 9. ALL OTHER COMBINATIONS 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 20 NOT CODED.
S160A.Q21A. DO YOU HAVE AN INFANTRY FIELD PACK (HAVERSACK)*  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q21B. DO YOU NEED ONE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER P. IF YOU USE AN INFANTRY FIELD PACK (HAVERSACK), ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS (QUESTIONS 22, 23, AND 24). IF YOU DO NOT USE AN INFANTRY PACK, GO ON TO QUESTION 25. X. QESTIONS 22A AND 22B NOT CODED.

S160A.Q23. DO WE HAVE SOME OTHER PACK OR CARRYING BAG THAT YOU THINK IS BETTER THAN THE INFANTRY PACK? IF YES, WHAT IS IT?  1. NO 2. YES, MUSETTE BAG 3. YES, SOMETHING ELSE SPECIFIED 4. YES, NOTHING ELSE SPECIFIED 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S160A.Q24A. HAVE YOU SEEN A GERMAN PACK OR CARRYING BAG THAT YOU THINK IS BETTER THAN OUR INFANTRY PACK? IF YES, DESCRIBE IT BRIEFLY.  1. NO 2. YES, NOTHING SPECIFIED 3. YES, SOMETHING SPECIFIED 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 24C NOT CODED.
S160A.Q25A. DO YOU HAVE A MUSETTE BAG ("BAG, CANVAS, FIELD")*  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q25B. DO YOU NEED ONE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER P. IF YOU HAVE A MUSETTE BAG ("BAG, CANVAS, FIELD"), ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS (QUESTIONS 26, 27, AND 28). IF YOU DO NOT USE A MUSETTE BAG, GO ON TO QUESTION 29. X. QUESTIONS 26A AND 26B NOT CODED.

S160A.Q27. DO WE HAVE SOME OTHER CARRYING BAG OR PACK THAT YOU THINK IS BETTER THAN THE MUSETTE BAG? IF YES, WHAT?  1. NO 2. YES, NOTHING SPECIFIED 3. YES, SOMETHING SPECIFIED 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S160A.Q28A. HAVE YOU SEEN A GERMAN CARRYING BAG OR PACK THAT YOU THINK IS BETTER THAN THE MUSETTE BAG? IF YES, DESCRIBE IT BRIEFLY.  1. NO 2. YES, NOTHING SPECIFIED 3. YES, SOMETHING SPECIFIED 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER X. Q.28C NOT CODED.
S160A.Q29. WITH YOUR PRESENT PACK OR CARRYING BAG, DO YOU HAVE ENOUGH POCKETS IN YOUR CLOTHES FOR CARRYING THINGS?  1. YES, HAVE ENOUGH POCKETS 2. NO, NEED MORE POCKETS 0. NO ANSWER

S160A.Q30. IF AN ADDITIONAL POCKET, OR POCKETS, WERE TO BE INCLUDED IN THE UNIFORM, WHERE DO YOU THINK THE POCKET OR POCKETS SHOULD BE PUT? (CHECK THE STATEMENT THAT BEST TELLS WHAT YOU WOULD RECOMMEND.)  1. I THINK THERE ARE ENOUGH POCKETS NOW 2. ONE LARGE OUTSIDE CARGO POCKET ON THE LEFT SIDE OF THE PANTS 3. ONE LARGE OUTSIDE CARGO POCKET ON THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE PANTS 4. TWO OUTSIDE CARGO POCKETS, ONE ON EACH SIDE OF THE PANTS 5. AN EXTRA POCKET ON THE FIELD JACKET, PLACE SPECIFIED 6. AN EXTRA POCKET ON THE FIELD JACKET, PLACE NOT SPECIFIED 7. SOME OTHER IDEA 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q31. THE SPACE BELOW IS FOR ANY OTHER COMMENTS OR SUGGESTIONS YOU WANT TO MAKE ABOUT QUARTERMASTER SUPPLIES OR EQUIPMENT.  1. SOME COMMENT 0. NO COMMENT

S160A.Q32. AT THE PRESENT WHERE DO YOU KEEP YOUR GAS MASK?  1. USUALLY CARRY IT ON ME 2. USUALLY LEAVE IT IN A CONVENIENT VEHICLE 3. HAVE IT IN STORAGE WITH THE SERVICE COMPANY 4. SOMEWHERE ELSE, PLACE SPECIFIED 5. SOMEWHERE ELSE, PLACE NOT SPECIFIED 6. I DO NOT HAVE A GAS MASK 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q33A. HAVE YOU EVER KNOWN ANYONE TO THROW AWAY OR DISCARD THEIR GAS MASK?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER
S160A.Q33B. HAVE YOU YOURSELF EVER THROWN AWAY OR DISCARDED YOUR GAS MASK?  1. NO 2. YES 0. NO ANSWER X. Q.33C NOT CODED.
S160A.V34. CAMP AND OUTFIT IDENTIFICATION: X. CODES NOT PROVIDED BY SURVEY ORGANIZATION. DATA TRANSFERRED AS IS.  ANP
